## Chapter 17 Exercises

### Problem 17.1
1.
```{r}
BabyNames %>%
  filter( grepl( "[aeiou]$", name ), sex =="M"  ) %>% 
  group_by(name)%>%
  summarise(total = sum(count))%>%
  arrange(desc(total))%>%
  head(10)
```

2.
```{r}
BabyNames %>% 
  filter(grepl(" ", name, ignore.case = TRUE)) %>%
  group_by(name)%>%
  summarise( total = sum(count))%>%
  arrange(desc(total))%>%
  head(10)
```

3.
```{r}
BabyNames %>% 
  filter(grepl( "Joe$|joe$", name)) %>%
  group_by(name)%>%
  summarise( total = sum(count))%>%
  arrange(desc(total))%>%
  head(10)
```

### Problem 17.7
```{r}
BibleNames <- 
  readr::read_csv("https://mdbeckman.github.io/dcSupplement/data/BibleNames.csv")
```

```{r}
BabyNames%>%
  inner_join(BibleNames)%>%
  group_by(name,meaning)%>%
  summarise( total = sum(count))%>%
  arrange(desc(total))%>%
  head(10)
```
